Name: Amends VR
About the game: “Amends” is an interactive VR experience about the chaotic emotions of a past connected to a relationship with a now estranged mother. You will through the perspective of a child revisit the memories of your upbringing and through time get to relive the complicated emotional relationship, which still awaits its resolution.
Meta Title: Amends VR: May 13, 2020, Amends Team and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Amends VR? Check out the release date (May 13, 2020), developer insights from Amends Team, and a complete game summary.
